channel.title: Hamilton, Hamilton, Hamilton...7th Podium Finish
channel.description:
Wtf is up with this guy. 7 races, 7 podium finishes, 2 1st places. Amazing. Only 22...Although he did snatch poll position, I was sure he would of won it. There's something about him.
French Grand prix in 2 weeks, looking forward to it.
Discuss F1.

item.title: Hamilton, Hamilton, Hamilton...7th Podium Finish
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

He is so holla and the fact he has just come out of no where. I reckon he’s the next Michael Schumacher
